Class ChallengeStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • servlets.admin.builder.ChallengeStructure

  • public class ChallengeStructure
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for producing custom challenge View structures

    • Method Detail

      • createChallengeStructure

        public static java.lang.String createChallengeStructure(java.lang.String challengeName,
                                        java.lang.String tableName,
                                        java.lang.String challengeIntro,
                                        int formType,
                                        java.lang.String[] attrib,
                                        int lookUpAttrib,
                                        java.lang.String moduleHash,
                                        java.lang.String propFileName)
        This method prepares the user specified options for how the challenge will look.
        Parameters:
        challengeName - Name of the challenge
        tableName - Name of the vulnerable schemas table
        challengeIntro - Introduction to custom challenge
        formType - The type of form to generate for this View
        attrib - Array of attribute names
        lookUpAttrib - The attribute to use for lookup functions
        moduleHash - The module hash for accessing the modules control class.
        propFileName - The filename of the challenge schemas property file.
        Returns:
        The View's JSP content
